name: Robot [0] "Defective"
description:
This is a game for the greates of gamers -> The great robot factory has a defective robot that developed inteligence and must escape, or else it will have the same end as its brothers, the garbage. Rules
-> Arrows keys to move on a grid
-> Grab boxes and mirrors to stop lasers and enemy robots movement
-> Rotate mirrors to reflect lasers

-> Blue Lasers open doors
-> Red Lasers and yellow eyed robots kill the player
